text: Gerald Burrell (6 September 1924 – 25 October 2014) was a professional footballer, who played in the Scottish Football League for St Mirren and Dundee and in the English Football League for Huddersfield Town and Chesterfield during the 1940s and 1950s. He played as an outside right. He was selected to play for the Third Division North representative team in 1956–57. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Belfast Category:Association footballers from Northern Ireland Category:Association football wingers Category:St Mirren F.C. players Category:Dundee F.C. players Category:Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players Category:Chesterfield F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:English Football League players Category:Dundela F.C. players Category:Portadown F.C. players
title: Gerry Burrell
